## Introduction

This is a sample note. The content is written in MDX, and the routing is handled by TanStack Router.

### Features

*   Dynamic routing
*   MDX content
*   Auto-generated Table of Contents

## Rehype Pretty Code

```python title="Sample Code"
print("Hello World!")

def greet(name: str) -> str:
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

message = greet("World")
print(message)
```


## Conclusion

This structure allows for easy content creation.
